detailsOfAchievement: We have conducted 2 Breast cancer checkup camps in which memography was done for 202 ladies of induri, Kanhewadi and Sagurdi village.  Two days Psychology workshop was conducted for 30 Anganwadi workers in which they were taught to identify children with psychological problems in various developmental stages and how to deal with them.  Conducted 3 fire fighting training camps for 214 AW teachers, helpers and Supervisers.  Disributed 100 Moringa plants in 11 Anganwadis as its leaves are helpful for improving malnutrition in children .  Gave training to 11 AW teachers for operating computers. Efforts are being taken to train them unless they clear MSCIT exam .  Now they are using computers for teaching AW children.  Nutrition Week is celebrated for the community ,in which competition of low cost nutritious recipes was conducted. Lecture by a nutritionist was also taken. Fruit plants like Amla, Papaya, Fig and Mango were given as Prizes. More activities such as sports and cultural events for children of ZP School children were conducted. We also teach free abacus and free supplementary classes for village children in their school. We are doing all the need based activities for the betterment of women and children of villagers.
